# @heroui/button

Buttons allow users to perform actions and choose with a single tap.

Please refer to the [documentation](https://heroui.com/docs/components/button) for more information.

## Installation

```sh
yarn add @heroui/button
# or
npm i @heroui/button
```

## Contribution

for details.
